00030 namespace Hyperspace {
00031 
00032   size_t encoded_length_dir_entry(const DirEntry &dir_entry) {
00033     return 1 + encoded_length_vstr(dir_entry.name);
00034   }
00035 
00036   void encode_dir_entry(uint8_t **bufp, const DirEntry &dir_entry) {
00037     encode_bool(bufp, dir_entry.is_dir);
00038     encode_vstr(bufp, dir_entry.name);
00039   }
00040 
00041   DirEntry &
00042   decode_dir_entry(const uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainp,
00043                          DirEntry &dir_entry) {
00044     HT_TRY("decoding dir entry",
00045       dir_entry.is_dir = decode_bool(bufp, remainp);
00046       dir_entry.name = decode_vstr(bufp, remainp));
00047     return dir_entry;
00048   }
00049 }
